body.name: PRINHSJI Mini Pocket Bluetooth Inkless Sticker Printer-Portable Thermal Printer with 10 Rolls Thermal Paper and Stickerfor Android or iOS APP,Portable Receipt Printer for Photo Journal Notes Memo
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Saturday, February 17 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 23 hrs 15 mins
features: 【Wireless Bluetooth Connection】The mini pocket printer compatible for iOS and Android Phone, support wireless BT 4.0. Download the App "Tiny Print" on your phone, then long press the printer switch and the green light flashes, turn on the blue-tooth device of our mobile phone, open the"Tiny Print" app and click "connect", refresh and click "X5" and connect. To start printing, please refer to the instructions and follow the instructions.

【Multifunctional Pocket Printer】 Only print black and white. Our inkless printer for printing black and white photos, memos, labels, cute pet stickers, QR codes, etc.This portable thermal printer have abundant templates, graphics, themes and hand drawn printing to meet more creative needs. Importantly, all everything in APP is free forever. Hurry up to enjoy your printing journey!

【Portability and Reliability】 Inkless pocket printer size is 3.34L*3.34W*1.77H inch, compact and only 193g. The inkless printer also came with with low power consumption, built-in 1200mAH battery, fully charged can be used for 15-20 hours. This thermal pocket printer for your DIY idea, the information and image on the phone screen can be printed instantly, convenient to print anytime anywhere. Helps you quickly organize and summarize work plans, shopping lists, etc, improve efficiency.
【Widely Used for Daily & Perfect Gift】 Little mini printer for phone is suitable for home, office, travel, classroom, study. The ideal birthday, anniversary, Christmas gift for anyone.

【10 rolls of Thermal Inkless Printing Paper】PRINHSJI Mini printer equipped with 10 rolls of thermal printing paper (5 rolls of high-quality white printing paper and 5 rolls of self-adhesive printing paper) size 57*25mm (width X diameter). Enough for your printing needs. Equipped with a high-quality thermal print head that generates patterns on thermal paper by heating without using ink. Patterns can only be printed on black and white photos. 203DPI high-resolution black and white images can be printed more clearly.
【Packaged Included & After-sales Service】Package includes 1 mini printer, 10 rolls of printing paper, 5 color pen,1 USB charging cable, 1 instruction manual and 24-hour after-sales service.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Mini & Portable Photo/Label Printer When Printing,please try selecting "Dark Photo" mode, it will make printing clearer! Mini Thermal Printer -Limitless Creativity &Effortless Printing Sticker Printer Beneficial for kids'Brain Development Mini Sticker Printer, excellent design,With our mini printer, you can record your life anywhere and anytime, print the scenery you see, record his or her sweet words, collect the exercises you have done wrong, fun and practical.can make it a good assistant in life, cultivate children's creativity, record happy moments at any time.

Portable Mini Printe,Powerful Mobile App,selecting "Dark Photo" mode, it will make printing clearer! Thermal printer supports both Android and iOS: download app "Tiny Print" from google play or APP store,then long press the printer switch and the green light flashes, turn on the wireless sticker printer and open the bluetooth on your phone, open the "Tiny Print" app to connect and use. The "Tiny Print" app is available for free to users indefinitely.The app offers a wide range of templates to choose from, including tags, lists, messages, as well as various material themes such as Christmas, Easter, Thanksgiving, and everyday line drawings. Rich print material on app-free to cultivate children's creativity, to make photos more stylish, to keep track of happiness moments at anytime and etc. Pocket printer is equipped with a high-quality thermal print head,without using ink.203DPI high resolution, which reduces consumables while improving the clarity of black and white pictures. Rechargeable printer, standby time up to at least a week, to meet the needs of travel, work or business in the printing needs.

Print Instantly Thermal Printer With its Bluetooth connectivity, the Mini Pocket Printer allows you to easily print photos, drawings, and other creative designs directly from your smartphone. Whether you're capturing special moments or creating personalized artwork.it an ideal tool for engaging in fun and creative activities with your children.

Multifunctional Pocket Printer：Inkless pocket Thermal printer size is 3.34L*3.34W*1.77H inch, compact and only 193g. You can easily carry it in your pocket or bag and take it anywhere you go. Whether you're using it at home, at the office, or on the go, this printer is sure to turn heads. Fast print set includes: Mini printer equipped with 10 rolls of thermal printing paper (5 rolls of thermal paper + 5 rolls of adhesive thermal paper) size 57*25mm (width X diameter). Enough for your printing needs. 5 colored pens in the kit can be used for graffiti the printing black and white pictures, to share parent-child graffiti time with your children. Our inkless printer for printing black and white photos, memos, labels, cute pet stickers, QR codes, etc. Information and images on the phone screen can be printed instantly. If you need a clearer print, please select the original image and darken the print.

Keep Your Best Moments, Mini Photo Printer for Gift Attention: Common problems and solutions ---Question A: Is the printed paper blank and patternless? ---Method A: The direction and position of the paper are reversed, and a different angle is needed. It can be placed according to the images ---Question B: Is the printer Work with android or only for iphone? ---Method B: Support android & ios Smart phone ---Question C: Is the printer print photos? ---Method C: Yes, photos can be printed, but it is printed in black and white, not in color

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: It came in a small box already charged. It was a breeze to set up and begin using. Only gave 4 stars because it was missing the markers and the charging cord

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this little printer!
reviews.reviewText: Makes super easy labels. It’s simple to use and fun. My daughter loves taking photos and making them little coloring sheets.I use them for labeling my extracts, recipe mixes, and craft supplies. The app is pretty easy to navigate. And it holds a charge a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Simple to use little printer
reviews.reviewText: This is a great little affordable printer option if you want to print out messages, small pictures or drawings, etc. It works really well depending on what you're trying to print. If you try to print a high quality photo, it isn't going to do a good job because that isn't what this printer is meant for. Since it is thermal, everything is printed in black and white and it won't show up the same way as the original picture. I wouldn't get this if you're wanting something to print photographs quickly. It is great for printing drawn versions of your pictures, text, small documents or files, etc. There is an app that you use with it that has tons of other printing features as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I did not know what to expect when I first got this product. It shipped very fast and came in a professional box with everything that you need. What excites me the most about this product is how easy it is to use and the functionality. All you need to do is to download the app and connect it wirelessly through Bluetooth which is flawless not always the case with some of the items that I buy. It also comes with plenty of rolls both receipt paper and sticker paper. I really love the app because it is so versatile with so many different options. The main reason that I got this is to make label stickers for my travels so if I lose an item people know how to contact me and it is perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fun for kids, print quality is okay
reviews.reviewText: I was not impressed with the print quality, but my kids were. It was incredibly easy to connect it to our devices wirelessly, and the app has a few fun things to do, such as printing photos from the camera roll or even describing something to the AI to design and print. The paper it comes with is rolled up very small and tight, so no matter what we print it immediately curls up. Overall it's fun for kids.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So easy to use, lots of paper
reviews.reviewText: This came charged and ready to use. I like that it came with a decent amount of paper/stickers...5 sticker rolls and 5 additional thermal paper rolls, with a full additional roll already loaded...so 11 rolls total. A set of mini marker, and the charger were included, as well. The app is easy to load and use, and I had this printing in just a couple minutes. The quality of the printer and the print quality itself is pretty good for a mini printer. I am very happy with this order!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fun with a lot of creative uses
reviews.reviewText: This little printer is fun, and it comes with quite a lot of paper, both regular rolls and adhesive-backed rolls. Setting it up was easy. We downloaded the phone app, opened up the connection tab, and it paired right away.2 quick negatives to note. The app has crashed a couple times. Not too big of a deal to open it right back up when it happened though. The other is the print quality has a defect. You can see in the photo there is a white line. It seems like there’s a defect in that one part of the print mechanism which causes a “lighter” zone as it prints.It is very easy to swap out paper rolls. You just flip open the front door, pull out the old, drop in the new. There are no complicated parts to fiddle with. Both the regular rolls and adhesive sticker rolls work well. My son (8) uses the app to make looooooong sticker signs to attach to his sister’s door when she’s not looking. Oh this reminds me, the adhesive on the included rolls is really strong. I got this for my kids to use, but I think you could get some good work done with it like labeling work related items, storage bins, or probably a million other creative use cases.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to setup and good prints
reviews.reviewText: I was amazed by the compact size of this tiny printer. It prints very good images in black and white and also has some neat features like anime & 3D type printing. It connected quickly via its app and the print time is only a few seconds. I think it's great for printing neat images for our kiddos or if you're wanting to print individual name tags (rolls of stickers) included as well as standard thermal paper. Overall, a very good value in a compact size portable to almost anywhere.
